Posts.Content: I have seen oncologist to get results from my oncotype dx test today. Result came back as 25 which doctor said was right in the middle so it was up to me to decide if i wanted chemo or not!! I have decided to have chemo. I think its the hardest decision ive ever had to make. Help! Have i made the right decision?
Posts.Title: Oncotype dx results

Posts.Content: Hi Josephineseems Thanks for your reply. It’s nice to know that you felt just like me. Obviously I’m sorry that you had to go through it too. I know I have made the right decision. I know it will be hard at times but we have to just stay strong don’t we?!  I hope you are recovering well
Posts.Title: Oncotype dx results

Posts.Content: Hi jacks77 Thanks for your reply. It’s so good to share our experiences on here it really helps to hear from others going through the same thing. I am also having EC. Let me know how you are getting on.  Take care
Posts.Title: Oncotype dx results
